mapper.sql: id, gtId AS gtId, ctId AS ctId, busId AS busId, discount, fuctId AS fuctId
mapper.select: select fuctId from t_member_gradetype_assistant where busId=#{busId} and gtId=#{gtId}
select * from t_member_gradetype_assistant where busId=#{busId} and ctId=#{ctId} order by id asc
mapper.delete: delete from t_member_gradetype_assistant where busId=#{busId} and ctId=#{ctId}
mapper.select: select id,ctId from t_member_gradetype_assistant where busId=#{busId} and gtId=#{gtId}
